overview: Harajuku is a district of Tokyo known for its youth culture and fashion. It is also synonymous with a girly-glam style of Japanese street fashion the Harajuku girls. In this film, three of Tokyo s finest the curvy and brown-eyed beauty Mion Hazuki, the playful Aoi, and the seductively reserved Moa Hoshizora get dressed up in everything from slutty schoolgirl outfits to some very revealing sportswear, and show you what they've got!
tagline: Do you want to touch me? Where? Right here. Right now...
title: Naughty Harajuku Girls
